Posts.Content: hello everyone! i just had my 6th taxol yesterday. i'm happy to say, that side effects for me have been very minimal. i hope it keeps on going this way. still have 6 more to go! finally felling like myself again now that the A/C is completely out of my system (haven't taken colace in 3 weeks!! lol) my hair is stubbly, food tastes fine, bowels are flowing and i have all my finger/toe nails! life is good! i've been posting on facebook a lot. we have a group on there as well. so if anyone is on facebook send a friend request to me and i'll add you! (carrie sue smurkowski) Happy Holidays!!! *hugs* carrie :)
Posts.Title: hello! it's been awhile since i've rambled on :)

Posts.Content: it's a scary thought! you never know how you're going to feel until it's done. after i had my lumpectomy this summer, i wondered if i did the right thing. i still look in the mirror and wonder if i did. should i have just gotten the mastectomy? i'm uneven now and my right side is quite a bit smaller than my left. and, that's just my own brain, because my boyfriend thinks i look fine. i don't know if any solution in the "right" one. our breasts make us womanly. it's hard not to want them around! IT DID TRY TO KILL YOU THOUGH! lol. ;) (how long do you have to wait for reconstruction after a mastectomy?) *hugs* carrie :)
Posts.Title: Mastectomy is my only option

Posts.Content: i know it wasn't me, because i never even use caps. lol. not even for the beginning of a sentence. (it's my thing.) ;) but, i agree, if you have nothing nice to say, don't say anything at all. what happened?? *hugs* carrie :)
Posts.Title: Please just LET IT GO..Thanks

Posts.Content: you have been nothing but sweet and positive! i love ya sister! i'm not sure why "buttons" are being pushed so bad about this. i'm not going anywhere. who cares if you type in caps? i know it means internet yelling, but if you're not saying anything rude, then who cares? *hugs* stop being so petty people! carrie :)

Posts.Content: well, that does make sense. that was dumb of me, starting another supplement. luckily it was my off week. next treatment of A/C is tomorrow. so far the A/C hasn't been that bad. uh oh! i hope the taxol isn't terrible. uggg. well, everyone is different, we never know how our bodies will respond. gotta keep positive :) thanks for your information, i appreciate it! carrie :)
Posts.Title: Supplements to strengthen immunity?

Posts.Content: what in antioxidants are bad? my onc approved all my other vitamins. i just bought acai supplements (i used to take them regularly, but stopped) that i started taking this week. eek! i won't take them anymore if it's not good for me. just wondering why? i am also on A/C right now. then 12 treatments of taxol. thanks carrie :)
Posts.Title: Supplements to strengthen immunity?

Posts.Content: my onc knew that i was taking a multi along with a few others. he didn't say anything about my multi. they only told me to stop taking st johns wort. it interacts negatively with a lot of different drugs. hopefully, it's not a big deal! i wonder about green tea too! after chemo, coffee makes me dizzy (too much caffeine, never thought i'd say that!) so i drink green tea too. guess, i better ask! *hugs* carrie :)
Posts.Title: Supplements to strengthen immunity?
